tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had taken my 5 year old daughter to Dr. Radhika and I was so so happy with the treatment she provided and also was spellbound on how amazing she is with kids !! I loved her patience and the way she got around to working on my daughter's cavity while brilliantly distracting her . I would definitely recommend going to her . Super happy !

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
context: Zirconia Crowns,Dental Deep Cleaning,Mouth piece/ night guard,
review:
Dr. Radhika recently completed two cap placements, conducted a thorough cleaning, and provided a tooth night guard.
Managing dental procedures can pose a challenge for me due to my heightened sensitivity to pain. However, Dr. Radhika's exceptional patience and detailed explanations made a world of difference. She recognized my low pain threshold and diligently prioritized my comfort throughout the procedures. Never rushing, she consistently addressed even the slightest discomfort or concern.
The clinic's tasteful design, cleanliness, and meticulous maintenance add to its welcoming and comfortable ambiance, enhancing the overall experience. What's even more impressive is the exceptional follow-up care extended by Dr. Radhika and her team. Their genuine dedication to their patient's well-being is palpable, leaving me with a profound sense of being valued and exceptionally well looked after.
Navigating dental procedures with heightened sensitivity to pain can be quite challenging for me. However, Dr. Radhika's unwavering commitment extended beyond maintaining my dental health to ensuring my utmost comfort, a gesture that I deeply appreciate.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr. Radhika for pain in my upper and lower jaw on the left side.  She immediately told me to get a scan done. After looking at the scan she explained very thoroughly the procedure of extraction of the wisdom tooth as it was growing at an angle causing infection and cavity. I was very scared and worried and she allied my fears and was very warm and understanding. She is a thorough professional who did an excellent job and the extraction was done in no time. Throughout the procedure, Dr. Radhika was talking to me and calming me down. During the extraction, she was telling me what was happening at each moment. She even showed me the tooth removed. Her nurse is also very sweet and held my hand when the anesthesia was injected. Dr Radhika had promised a pain free experience and that is exactly what had happened. There was no swelling and the healing was very fast. Thank you so much for such an amazing experience for a person who got something done on her teeth for the first time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had visited Dr. Radhika for a general checkup and cleaning as it had been a while since my last dentist visit. Dr. Radhika was very friendly and communicative. She helped ease my concerns on some worries I had, while also taking me step by step through what she was doing and how it was going to help. She was very careful in ensuring that the cleaning was not causing me any discomfort and was efficient too, finishing the whole process in under an hour. Would happily recommend her to anybody looking for a quick, comfortable, and informative checkup. :)

Dr. Radhika ** * **** **** ****** *** makes ypu feel comfortable as soon as you meet her. She explained things in detail. She had also follo2ed up post the etraction to know how I'm feeling which made me feel even more comfortable. The procedure was carried out very smoothly.

You have any issue with your teeth, she is tge person to go to...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Full satisfaction with Radhika's work, at every level. Very professional yet friendly and caring. Lovely team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had a seamless experience with Doctor Radhika. She is extremely warm and is quite informative towards her patients. 
She not only changed my odd looking cap into a quite natural looking one but also explained me every step of the process.
Had found her through practo, and I‚Äôm glad I came across her. Every parameter, be it cleanliness, wait time, cure, satisfaction with treatment etc- I would give her and the team 10 on 10.
